item.title: Nazia Bibi: first player from J&K to represent India at Kho Kho World Cup - Greater Kashmir
item.description:
Nazia Bibi: First Player from J&K to Represent India at Kho Kho World Cup

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: Local News

Nazia Bibi, a 21-year-old athlete from Jammu and Kashmir, has made history by being the first player from the region selected for the Indian Women’s Kho Kho team.

The upcoming tournament will feature over 20 nations and starts on January 13, 2025, at the Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium in New Delhi.

  • Nazia started her sports journey during her school years and has been playing professionally for the past seven years.
  • She is currently pursuing a BA at Padma Shri Padma Sachdev Govt College for Women in Jammu.
  • Her army-serving cousins inspired her passion for athletics.
  • Nazia is the only female athlete from J&K selected after a national camp.
  • Her family is immensely proud and supportive of her achievement.
  • Officials from the J&K State Kho Kho Association have praised her selection as a milestone for regional sports.
“Watching my cousins excel in athletics fueled my passion to pursue a career in sports.” - Nazia Bibi

Nazia Bibi's selection marks a significant moment for sports in Jammu and Kashmir, inspiring future generations of athletes.

item.title: Mohammed Shami picked for T20 series against England - The Indian Express
item.description:
Mohammed Shami Returns for T20 Series Against England

Publication Date: January 11, 2025
Source: Indian Express

Fast bowler Mohammed Shami is set to return to the Indian cricket team for the upcoming T20 series against England after recovering from an ankle injury.

  • Shami last played for India in the 2023 World Cup final.
  • He underwent surgery and has been recovering, playing domestic matches in the interim.
  • The selectors have included Dhruv Jurel as the second wicketkeeper, while Rishabh Pant misses out.
  • Nitish Reddy, who performed well in Australia, is also included in the T20 squad.
  • Riyan Parag has been excluded due to injury.
“Based on the current medical assessment, the BCCI medical team has determined that his knee requires more time for controlled exposure to bowling loads.” - BCCI Release

India T20 squad: Suryakumar Yadav, Sanju Samson, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Tilak Varma, Nitish Reddy, Mohd Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Dhruv Jurel, Rinku Singh, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Ravi Bishnoi, Varun Chakravarthy, Washington Sundar.

The T20 matches against England will begin on January 22 in Kolkata.

item.title: Yuvraj Singh's Old Interview Goes Viral After Virat Kohli Gets Blamed For Cutting Short His Career - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Yuvraj Singh's Old Interview Goes Viral After Virat Kohli Gets Blamed For Cutting Short His Career

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NDTV

An old interview of former India player Yuvraj Singh has gone viral after ex-batter Robin Uthappa held Virat Kohli indirectly responsible for cutting short the all-rounder's international career. Uthappa claimed that Yuvraj's request for certain fitness concessions during his return to the team after beating cancer was denied by then-captain Kohli.

  • Yuvraj was one of India's finest players, contributing to the team's World Cup success in 2011.
  • After recovering from cancer, he made a comeback, scoring a hundred against England.
  • Following limited outings, he decided to retire in 2019 after feeling sidelined.
“Never thought that I would be dropped after being the Man of the Match in 2 games... I was told to prepare for the Sri Lanka series. Then suddenly, the Yo-Yo test came into the picture.” - Yuvraj Singh

This controversy highlights issues within team management decisions and the treatment of players faced with challenging circumstances.

item.title: India's Champions Trophy And England Series Squad Live: BCCI To Take Drastic Step Over Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj? - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India's Champions Trophy 2025 And England Series Squad Announcement Live

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The deadline for the squad selection for the Champions Trophy and the England white-ball series is fast approaching. India has requested an extension to submit the provisional squad, which needs to be finalized by February 12.

  • The BCCI selection committee, led by Ajit Agarkar, will announce the squads soon.
  • Following a disappointing performance against Australia, significant changes are likely.
  • Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are expected to be included in the teams.
  • Mohammed Siraj and Jasprit Bumrah may not play in the T20Is but are expected to return for the ODIs.
  • KL Rahul's participation remains uncertain as he might be rested.
“Will the squad be announced today? Fans are eagerly awaiting the decisions from the selection committee.”

The live updates provide insights into the anticipated squad application and player conditions, with several players' fitness under scrutiny.

item.title: No Chance For Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj: Report Makes Big Claim On India Squad vs England In T2.. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
No Chance For Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj: Report Makes Big Claim On India Squad vs England In T20Is

Publication Date: January 25, 2025

Source: NDTV

The Indian cricket team's upcoming five-T20I series against England is set to kick off on January 22, marking their first assignment after the Border Gavaskar Trophy. Reports suggest key players Jasprit Bumrah and Mohammed Siraj may be missing from the squad.

  • The T20 squad is expected to be announced soon, with no major surprises anticipated.
  • Arshdeep Singh is likely to lead the pace attack in Bumrah and Siraj's absence.
  • Mohammed Shami may return for the ODI series and Champions Trophy despite missing the T20Is.
  • Nitish Kumar Reddy is expected to be included in the T20I squad against England.
“The squad for the Champions Trophy may take some time to be announced.”

This series serves as an important preparation ahead of the ICC Champions Trophy starting February 19, making the squad announcements critical for team strategy.

item.title: No Shaheen And Naseem Shah As PCB Announces Test Squad For West Indies Series - OneCricket
item.description:
Pakistan Announces Test Squad for West Indies Series: Key Players Rested

Publication Date: Not specified   |   Source: One Cricket News

In the latest development, Pakistan has revealed their Test squad for the West Indies series, scheduled to be played in Multan from January 17-21 and January 25-29. Key players have been rested to manage their workload.

  • Seven changes have been made to the squad that toured South Africa.
  • Star pacers Naseem Shah and Shaheen Afridi are among those rested.
  • Experienced spinners Sajid Khan and Abrar Ahmed have been added to support Noman Ali.
  • Imam-ul-Haq and Mohammad Huraira return to replace injured Saim Ayub and Abdullah Shafique.
  • Kashif Ali, an uncapped pacer, has been included in the squad.
  • Haseebullah Khan is out due to a hand injury; Rohail Nazir has been named in his place.

Pakistan Squad For The West Indies Tests: Shan Masood (captain), Saud Shakeel (vice-captain), Abrar Ahmed, Babar Azam, Imam-ul-Haq, Kamran Ghulam, Kashif Ali, Khurram Shahzad, Mohammad Ali, Mohammad Huraira, Mohammad Rizwan (wicketkeeper/batter), Noman Ali, Rohail Nazir (wicketkeeper/batter), Sajid Khan, and Salman Ali Agha.

This squad adjustment highlights Pakistan's strategic approach to player management ahead of future matches.

item.title: Pakistan name squad for West Indies Tests - PCB
item.description:
Pakistan Announces Squad for West Indies Test Series

Publication Date: 11 January 2025

Source: Pakistan Cricket Board

The Pakistan Cricket Board has announced a 15-player squad for the upcoming Tests against the West Indies in Multan.

  • The matches are scheduled from January 17-21 and January 25-29.
  • Seven changes were made from the previous squad that toured South Africa.
  • Shan Masood remains captain, with Saud Shakeel as vice-captain.
  • Off-spinner Sajid Khan and mystery spinner Abrar Ahmed return to bolster the spin department.
  • Openers Imam-ul-Haq and Mohammad Huraira replace injured and out-of-form players.
  • Former U19 captain Rohail Nazir joins the squad as wicketkeeper-batter due to Haseebullah's injury.

Pakistan squad for the West Indies Tests: Shan Masood (captain), Saud Shakeel (vice-captain), Abrar Ahmed, Babar Azam, Imam-ul-Haq, Kamran Ghulam, Kashif Ali, Khurram Shahzad, Mohammad Ali, Mohammad Huraira, Mohammad Rizwan (wicketkeeper/batter), Noman Ali, Rohail Nazir (wicketkeeper/batter), Sajid Khan, Salman Ali Agha.

item.title: SA20 2025: Match 4, JSK vs MICT Match Prediction – Who will win today’s SA20 match between JSK vs MICT? - CricTracker
item.description:
SA20 2025: Match 4 Prediction - Joburg Super Kings vs MI Cape Town

Date & Source: Saturday, January 11, 9 pm IST - CricTracker

The fourth match of the 2025 SA20 season features a face-off between Joburg Super Kings and MI Cape Town at The Wanderers Stadium. The Super Kings are set to make their debut in the tournament, while Cape Town arrives with a recent dominant victory.

Key Points:

  • Venue: The Wanderers Stadium, Johannesburg
  • Joburg Super Kings will play their first game of the season.
  • MI Cape Town won their previous match by 97 runs.
  • The pitch is expected to favor high scores, advantageous for batters.
  • Head-to-head record: 4 matches - 2 wins each for both teams.
  • Predicted best batter: Reeza Hendricks
  • Predicted best bowler: Trent Boult

“Today's Match Prediction: MI Cape Town to win the match.”

It's anticipated that MI Cape Town will continue their winning momentum against the Joburg Super Kings in this exciting matchup.

item.title: SA20 2025: Match 3, PR vs SEC Match Prediction – Who will win today’s SA20 match between PR vs SEC? - CricTracker
item.description:
SA20 2025: Match 3, PR vs SEC Match Prediction – Who will win today’s SA20 match between PR vs SEC?

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: CricTracker

Paarl Royals will face Sunrisers Eastern Cape in Match 3 of SA20 2025 at Boland Park. This match is anticipated as Sunrisers aim to continue their winning streak from 2024.

  • Paarl Royals qualified for the knockouts in 2024 but were eliminated by Joburg Super Kings.
  • Sunrisers Eastern Cape last won the SA20 title in 2024.
  • The pitch at Boland Park favors batters, although spinners may find assistance.
  • Paarl Royals are hopeful for better performance with the addition of Dinesh Karthik.
  • Match prediction favors the team batting first to win.
“Today's Match Prediction: Team batting first to win the match.”

This match sets the stage for an exciting clash as both teams look to assert dominance early in the tournament.

item.title: "If You Suggest Changes...": Ex-India Coach On How Virat Kohli Reacted To Advice - NDTV Sports
item.description:
"If You Suggest Changes...": Ex-India Coach On How Virat Kohli Reacted To Advice

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: NDTV

Indian cricket star Virat Kohli faced criticism following his performance in the Test series against Australia. Former coach Bharat Arun shares insights on Kohli's reaction to advice and criticism.

  • Kohli scored only 190 runs in 5 matches in the recent Test series.
  • Criticism focused on Kohli's struggle with balls outside the off-stump.
  • Bharat Arun emphasized that Kohli requires valid reasons for any suggested changes.
  • Robin Uthappa suggested Kohli had a role in Yuvraj Singh's shortened international career.
"See, Virat Kohli will definitely ask. If you suggest changes to him or anything like that, you should have a very good reason as to why you are suggesting it." - Bharat Arun

This discussion sheds light on Kohli's approach to feedback and the expectations placed upon him as a top player.

item.title: Batters, Asitha Fernando give Sri Lanka consolation win - Cricbuzz
item.description:
Sri Lanka Clinches Consolation Win Over New Zealand in Third ODI

Published on: Sat, Jan 11, 2025, 09:33 AM | Source: Cricbuzz

Sri Lanka gained a consolation win by clinching the third ODI against New Zealand by a massive margin of 140 runs, with significant contributions from batters and bowlers.

  • Sri Lanka set the highest score of the series, reaching 290 runs.
  • Asitha Fernando took three wickets in the powerplay, devastating New Zealand's batting lineup.
  • New Zealand struggled, collapsing to 21/5 early in their innings.
  • Mark Chapman scored a lone 81 runs but couldn't save the team from defeat.
  • Sri Lanka's Pathum Nissanka scored 66 runs, supported by Kusal Mendis and Janith Liyanage.
Brief Scores: Sri Lanka 290/8 (Pathum Nissanka 68, Kusal Mendis 54, Janith Liyanage 53; Matt Henry 4-55) beat New Zealand 150 all out (Mark Chapman 81; Asitha Fernando 3-26) by 140 runs

This win serves as a morale booster for Sri Lanka in their tour, showcasing their batting depth and bowling prowess.

item.title: Smith flays 121* to send a reminder of his T20 worth - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Smith's Stellar 121* Secures Victory for Sydney Sixers in BBL Showdown

Publication Date: Saturday, Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Steven Smith dazzled with a remarkable unbeaten 121 to lead the Sydney Sixers to a 14-run victory over the Perth Scorchers, marking a memorable BBL innings.

The match highlights include:

  • Smith scored 121 runs off just 64 balls, hitting seven sixes.
  • The Sydney Sixers posted their highest total in the BBL with 220 for 3.
  • Sean Abbott contributed significantly with the ball, claiming 4 wickets for 43 runs.
  • Smith's century ties him with Ben McDermott for the most centuries in BBL history.
  • Ashton Turner was the top scorer for the Scorchers with 66 runs.
“It may have been his best yet,” a commentator noted about Smith's performance.

Smith's performance is a reminder of his significance in T20 cricket, proving his critical role in the Sixers' lineup as they push towards the finals.

item.title: India squad for England T20Is soon: No Bumrah, Shubman Gill and Rishabh Pant; focus on Nitish Kumar Reddy, Tilak Varma - Hindustan Times
item.description:
India's squad for the T20I series against England is set to be announced this weekend; Regulars like Bumrah, Shubman Gill and Rishabh Pant will be rested.

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

India is finalizing its T20I squad for the upcoming five-match series against England, with several key players set to be rested. The announcement is expected between January 11 and 12, led by new captain Suryakumar Yadav.

  • Regular players Jasprit Bumrah, Shubman Gill, and Rishabh Pant will be rested.
  • The selection committee, led by Ajit Agarkar, will finalize the squad after the BCCI AGM.
  • India haven't played an ODI since August and will use the T20I series as preparation before the Champions Trophy.
  • Sanju Samson is expected to continue as wicketkeeper, while Tilak Varma is likely to bat at No.3.
  • Mohammed Siraj and Bumrah will miss out due to injury, with a new pace attack expected to take the field.
  • Nitish Kumar Reddy and Shivam Dube are set for a comeback in the T20I set-up.
“The team has remodelled its style under Suryakumar Yadav, who has led them to success in recent series.”

The upcoming T20I series represents a crucial step in India's preparation for the Champions Trophy starting on February 19, with a blend of experienced players and emerging talent expected to feature prominently.

item.title: Gukesh earns INR 13.6 crore from prize money alone in 2024, two times more than US President's annual salary - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Gukesh Dommaraju's Prize Money in 2024 Surpasses US President's Salary

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In an impressive year for chess, Gukesh Dommaraju earned a total of INR 13.6 crore in prize money, marking a significant achievement in his young career.

  • Gukesh became the youngest-ever winner of the Candidates tournament in 2024.
  • He went on to become the youngest world champion in chess history.
  • His prize money from chess titles totals USD 15,77,842, equivalent to INR 13.6 crore.
  • The Tamil Nadu government announced a reward of INR 5 crore for Gukesh’s World Championship win.
  • Gukesh participated in 8 major tournaments throughout the year.
  • Only two players in the world earned more than a million dollars in 2024.
“Gukesh resided in the top tier of chess earnings, showcasing immense talent.”

This year has solidified Gukesh Dommaraju's place as a rising star in the world of chess, with potential for even greater achievements in the future.

item.title: BCCI Calls Meeting With Gautam Gambhir, Says Report. Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma May Be Given... - NDTV Sports
item.description:
BCCI Discusses Future of Kohli and Rohit in Upcoming Meeting

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The BCCI is set to hold a meeting with Gautam Gambhir and Chief Selector Ajit Agarkar to discuss the future of star players Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma after recent disappointing performances in international cricket.

  • The upcoming meeting will review the recent tour to Australia and performances against New Zealand.
  • Concerns are growing about Kohli and Rohit's diminishing returns at the crease.
  • Selectors will also discuss team composition for the upcoming Champions Trophy in the UAE.
  • Questions remain over whether to transition younger players now or wait until after the next ICC event.
  • Kohli and Rohit's performances in the upcoming ODI Champions Trophy could be crucial for their futures.
"Both Kohli and Rohit have played just three ODIs in 2024 after the World Cup, which might be too light of a sample size to make a final call on their careers."

This meeting will also include a review of the Gamir-led coaching staff's performance and strategies moving forward.

item.title: Trust the process! Ruben Amorim is following Mikel Arteta's blueprint for rebuilding Man Utd in bid to replicate Arsenal's resurgence - Goal.com
item.description:
Trust the process! Ruben Amorim is following Mikel Arteta's blueprint for rebuilding Man Utd in bid to replicate Arsenal's resurgence

Date: October 2023 Source: Goal.com

Ruben Amorim is set to follow the successful rebuilding strategies of Mikel Arteta as he takes on the challenge of revitalizing Manchester United, aiming to replicate Arsenal's recent successes.

  • Amorim's managerial approach mirrors that of Arteta.
  • Focus on youth development and strategic player acquisitions.
  • Plans to enhance team chemistry and performance.
  • Potential long-term impact on Manchester United's trajectory in the league.
“Success does not come overnight; it’s a journey built on trust and patience.”

This strategy reflects a growing trend in top clubs prioritizing long-term stability and success through thoughtful planning.

item.title: ILT20 2025: Match 1, DC vs MIE Match Prediction – Who will win today’s ILT20 match between DC vs MIE? - CricTracker
item.description:
ILT20 2025: Match 1, DC vs MIE Match Prediction

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: CricTracker

The inaugural match of the ILT20 2025 season will feature Dubai Capitals facing off against Mumbai Emirates at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium. Both teams are eager to start the season strong; the Emirates as title defenders and the Capitals aiming for improvement.

Key Points:

  • Match scheduled for January 11, 2025, at 7:30 PM IST.
  • Venue: Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
  • Live Broadcast: Available on FanCode App and Zee Network.
  • Pit Report indicates a high-scoring opportunity favoring batters.
  • Head-to-Head: Out of 3 encounters, DC won 2 and MI won 1.
“MI Emirates to win the match”

This match kicks off the ILT20 2025 season, generating excitement among fans and analysts alike.

item.title: BBL 2024-2025: Match 31, STR vs HEA Match Prediction – Who will win today’s BBL match between STR vs HEA? - CricTracker
item.description:
BBL 2024-2025: Match 31, STR vs HEA Match Prediction

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: CricTracker

The Big Bash League (BBL) continues with the Adelaide Strikers taking on the Brisbane Heat in Match 31. The struggling Strikers aim to turn their season around, while the Heat look to strengthen their position in the top standings.

Key Points:

  • The match will be held at Adelaide Oval.
  • Adelaide Strikers currently have lost five of their seven matches.
  • Brisbane Heat has won three out of seven matches so far.
  • Pitch condition favors batting, with an average first innings score of 158.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“Max Bryant has hammered 225 runs at a strike rate of 167.91 this season.”

“Lloyd Pope has taken 11 wickets in seven innings.”

Conclusion:

The prediction favors Brisbane Heat to win against the Adelaide Strikers based on current form and statistics.
